component.name: PDF Stitcher
component.summary: PDF Stitcher is a utility to stitch together and modify line properties of PDF sewing patterns

description.p: PDFStitcher was developed to help sewists convert print-at-home PDF sewing patterns into a single large file suitable for use with a projector. Just like printing and taping together a paper pattern, PDFStitcher takes the specified page range, amount to trim from each page, and number of rows or columns and assembles the pages together to form a complete pattern.

ul.li: Stitch together pages in any order with specified number of rows/columns
Add a margin around the final output
Trim or overlap the edges of each page by a specified amount
Add blank pages by including zeros in the page list (e.g. 1-5,0,6-10)
Layers are automatically preserved if present in the source document
Modify line properties (colour, thickness, style (solid, dashed, dotted))
